patch 8.2.1053: insufficient testing for 'statusline' and 'tabline'

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/801ab069341c8652680d63c174530fd4feb2911e|patch 8.2.1054: not so easy to pass a lua function to Vim>
patch 8.2.1054: not so easy to pass a lua function to Vim

Problem:    Not so easy to pass a lua function to Vim.
Solution:   Convert a Lua function and closure to a Vim funcref. (Prabir
            Shrestha, closes #6246)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1054: not so easy to pass a lua function to Vim · vim/vim@801ab06
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1054: not so easy to pass a lua function to Vim · vim/vim@801ab06
attachments.text: Problem: Not so easy to pass a lua function to Vim. Solution: Convert a Lua function and closure to a Vim funcref. (Prabir Shrestha, closes #6246)

text:

patch 8.2.1055: no filetype set for pacman config files

Problem:    No filetype set for pacman config files.
Solution:   Recognize pacman.conf and *.hook. (Guido Cella, closes #6335)

patch 8.2.1056: wrong display when mixing match conceal and syntax conceal

patch 8.2.1057: cannot build with dynamic Lua

Solution:   Add dll variables.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/fc838d6cb0f22c77a6ee2befd034b593e1c5ea06|patch 8.2.1058: multiline conceal causes display errors>
patch 8.2.1058: multiline conceal causes display errors

Problem:    Multiline conceal causes display errors.
Solution:   Do not allow conceal cross over EOL. (closes #6326, closes #4854,
            closes #6302)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1058: multiline conceal causes display errors · vim/vim@fc838d6
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1058: multiline conceal causes display errors · vim/vim@fc838d6
attachments.text: Problem: Multiline conceal causes display errors. Solution: Do not allow conceal cross over EOL. (closes #6326, closes #4854, closes #6302)
